name: Tri-Peaks Solitaire Pro: Card Brain IQ Training
name_original: Tri-Peaks Solitaire Pro: Card Brain IQ Training
description:
PRO VERSION! Play and enjoy without any Ads!

*****Tri-Peaks***** Download a really great solitaire game! Tri-Peaks Solitiaire is a super addictive card game variation of Solitaire that will keep you entertained for hours. This game requires skill and patience to win! Now you can play Tri-Peaks Solitaire anywhere at any time of the day.

Features include:
+ ios8 compatible
+ Preview hints
+ Autoplay
+ Unlimited undo
+ Smooth card animations
+ Drag and drop or simple select and move controls
+ Move whole stacks quickly with simple tap controls
+ Customize your colors
+ Timing and scoring modes
+ Supports all devices
+ Landscape and Portrait modes
+ Leaderboards for high scores challenges with your friends
+ Great tutorials for each different game

It really doesn't get any better than relaxing to a great game of solitaire! Learn a new and fun variation on this awesome classic card game!

Don't pass up this opportunity to have this solitaire game! Download and enjoy :) Thanks for playing!
